description: This file contains functions for generating JSON-RPC related C++ headers, enums, and stub implementations based on JSON schema input. It includes code for creating API headers, generating classes, enums, version info, and stub code for JSON-RPC services, and manages file generation conditions.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing JSON-RPC API declarations, including relevant header includes based on input headers list.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate JSON-RPC related code, including classes, enums, version info, stubs, and implementation files based on provided schema and configuration flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
